metadata.author: Prismatica Labs
metadata.notes: Consulting Services navigation link on What We Do page - PRIMARY variant with red border

athenaPrompt: Need custom work that adapts as the problem reveals itself?

body.text: Some problems need custom work. Every consultancy, SaaS pitch deck, and agency website uses the same words. 'Transformation over transaction.' 'Strategic partnerships.' 'Solutions.' We won't.
We work directly with you and adapt as the problem reveals itself. First call is diagnostic. If we're not finding new angles within 30 minutes, walk away.

footer.primaryText: We fix things. Then we leave.
